name: 3DMark 2006
description:
* License: Legacy,
* Hardware acceleration benchmark software,
* Legacy key: 3DM06-YKL9-C7R6-73WW-AAPA-VHKW,
* Legacy user: Futuremark,
* Tested: 3DMark 2001 to 2006. 
  They all 'work' with the Futuremark SystemInfo 4.15.0, 
  that "comes from downloading and installing 2006".
* SystemInfo : 4.15.0,
* MP3codec DirectShow,
* DirectX: 9c,
* D9VK,
* OpenAl,
* Visual C++: 2005, 2010.
content:
files:
- setup: https://benchmarks.ul.com/downloads/3dmark06.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Futuremark/3DMark06/3DMark06.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit prefix ...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: l3codecx
    arch: win64
    description: MP3codec DirectShow ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    arch: win64
    description: Visual C++ 2010 libraries ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2005
    arch: win64
    description: Visual C++ 2005 libraries ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win81
    arch: win64
    description: Windows version 8.1 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d9vk_master
    arch: win64
    description: Vulkan ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: setup
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/3dmark06.exe
- task:
    description: 3DMark 2006 ...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/3dmark06.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Register KeyCode ...
    key: KeyCode
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\Futuremark\3DMark06
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 3DM06-YKL9-C7R6-73WW-AAPA-VHKW
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Register KeyCode ...
    key: KeyCode
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_USERS\S-1-5-21-0-0-0-1000\Software\Futuremark\3DMark
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 3DM06-YKL9-C7R6-73WW-AAPA-VHKW
system:
  disable_compositor: true
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
